Stories.title: Letter of Recommendation: The 1,500 Year Old Game
Stories.Description: A letter of recommendation for chess, a game that has brought me joy and education.

Stories.title: Complaint Box: I like a lot of things, not this.
Stories.Description: A humorous critique of parking lot chaos and the absurdities of human behavior.

Stories.title: Fishing Ephinoy
Stories.Description: A reflection on the calming and restorative power of fishing amidst life's busyness.
